experience.name: Hulu/Disney Streaming
notes: Led front-end development of a first-party interactive ad solution for Hulu device platforms.
Led development integrating 3rd-party playback analytics into device platforms.
Analyzed performance on live programming guide and optimized to improve initial render time by 75% (~6 seconds). Response times in navigation were also improved.
Collaborated with UI designers and product managers on improved playback seeking experience and “channel flipping” features.
Assisted in development of a NodeJS based Roku BrightScript interpreter.
Gave lectures across the organization on Apple HLS standards, team-scale project planning techniques, pair programming techniques, and mob programming techniques.
Mentored junior developers on project management and scalable software patterns.

experience.name: iStreamPlanet
notes: Gathered requirements, designed, and implemented automated video source routing and monitoring via service interfacing with hardware routers.
Led telemetry and monitoring efforts on core transcoding platform using StatsD, Kafka, and DataDog.
Gathered requirements and developed components responsible for ad and program signaling. Ingested SCTE-35 broadcasting-standard signals and produced output based on user settings.
Designed and implemented logging and debugging pipeline for the above component using AWS services such as Kinesis, Lambda, and ElasticSearch.
Led investigations on time-sensitive software defects and service outages.

experience.name: Ingeniux Inc.
notes: Developed document search framework on top of Lucene allowing search results to be fine-tuned on a per customer basis. Improved original design to increase speeds up to 66%.
Addressed performance issues with user importing resulting in processing times going from hours to minutes.

experience.name: Schweitzer Engineering Laboratory
notes: Designed user interface and worked with senior engineers to develop reporting interface for power station equipment.
